Resources for Working with Images

4.00 from 2 votes

Created: Nov. 20th, 2009

Tags:

 

  • Animated GIFs in Fireworks

    A tutorial on how to make animated GIFs in Adobe Fireworks

  • 40 Beautiful Free Icon Sets

    A great collection of free quality icon sets by Six Revisions

  • COLOURlovers

    A design community focused around colours, colour pallets and patterns. A great place to go for inspiration.

  • 500ml Brushes

    Excellent Photoshop brush collection by a young woman in Europe.

  • Give Photos a lomo/holga look

    To give your images that hipster feel

  • FREE PNG PSD PSP TUBES from Pewter7

    Lots of great image pieces to use in your design creations.

  • PSDtuts+

    One of the best sources for photoshop tutorials.

  • 60 Most Wanted Photoshop Tutorials, Brushes, .PSDs and Resources at Noupe.com

    Great list to go through when you want to learn something new in Photoshop.

  • Color Highlights in Black & White Images

    Easy tutorial on how to selectively remove colours from and image to get a colour highlights on black & white effect.

  • PNG textures at Maga-Tex

    Neato plants and animal cut outs with transparent backgrounds.
